posts.post_title: SOLD - A pair of tougher T206
posts.post_content:
Both are guaranteed authentic/unaltered.  The bottoms of both cards show the slightest hint of the next card on the print sheet.  Certainly not enough to warrant any premium but enough to warrant "mc" grades at PSA.  Selling as a pair only.

$old 

email - [url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]
